how_it_built.title: How it built
how_it_built.answer: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Headless UI

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.answer: This is a Next.js project bootstrapped with create-next-app.
introduction.visit_my_blog: Please visit <2>https://jlprofile.home.blog/</2> with more visualisation details for the projects that I have done.

objective.title: Objective
objective.answer: Just another way to introduce myself and self-learning.

experiences.title: My working experiences
experiences.summary: In short I had a total of 7 years work experience in both the SME and MNC sector.
experiences.sme: In SME, I handle multiple projects simultaneously which greatly expands my technical knowledge and improves my time management skills.
experiences.mnc: In MNC, I code with best practice and given proper training.
experiences.conclusion: I believe I can continuously improve in both hard skills or soft skills.

figure.blockquote: I am a developer, I create bug not quote.

self_introduction.deep_dive_to_study: Please deep dive into webpage to study about me.
self_introduction.main: My name is Hoo Jian Liang, a Software Developer with a total of 7 years work experience, previously worked as full stack developer and currently working as Frontend Web Developer in Razer Inc. under Razer Gold department.
self_introduction.why: I choose to be a frontend developer because frontend is interesting, I loved and used to build responsive websites.
